data.name: Sample - IBM Security QRadar SOAR - 1.1.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "IBM Security QRadar SOAR" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Incident Details
workflows.description: Retrieves a specific incident from IBM Security QRadar SOAR based on the incident ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: IBM Security QRadar SOAR: Get Incident Details

workflows.name: Get Incident Tasks
workflows.description: Retrieve a list of tasks for the incident from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

arguments.title: IBM Security QRadar SOAR: Get Incident Tasks

workflows.name: Create Incident
workflows.description: Creates a incident in IBM Security QRadar SOAR based on the incident name, and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: IBM Security QRadar SOAR: Create Incident

workflows.name: Update Incident
workflows.description: Updates an incident in IBM Security QRadar SOAR based on the incident ID, and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: IBM Security QRadar SOAR: Update Incident

workflows.name: Get Incidents Simulations
workflows.description: Retrieve a list of simulations from IBM Security QRadar SOAR.

arguments.title: IBM Security QRadar SOAR: Get Incidents Simulations

workflows.name: Search Incidents
workflows.description: Retrieves all incidents from IBM Security QRadar SOAR based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: IBM Security QRadar SOAR: Search Incidents

workflows.name: Close Incident
workflows.description: Closed an incident in IBM Security QRadar SOAR based on the incident ID you have specified.

arguments.title: IBM Security QRadar SOAR: Close Incident
